_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Various winds that blow in the sky [sn36: Winds that blow from the east
Winds that blow from the west
Winds that blow from the north
Winds that blow from the south
The result of completely understanding f: They're without defilements in this very life
That knowledge master is firm in principle
When their body breaks up, they can't be reckoned.
